mapper.select: SELECT A.PROVINCE AS province, A.CITY AS city, A.DISTRICT AS district, A.OPERATORNAME AS operatorname, B.CUSTOMERNAME AS customername, LEFT(CONCAT(C.SERIAL_NUMBER,''),11) AS serialNumber, D.PROD_NAME AS prodName, T.BUSI_ORDER_DATE AS busiOrderDate, T.pay_flag AS payFlag, ( CASE WHEN T.pay_flag=1 THEN '已签约' WHEN T.pay_flag=0 THEN '未签约' ELSE '未知' END ) payFlagName FROM busi_order T, account A, customer B, SERIAL C, prod D WHERE T.OPER_ID=A.OPERATORID AND T.CUSTID=B.CUSTID AND T.SERIAL_ID=C.SERIAL_ID AND T.PROD_ID=D.PROD_ID
SELECT b.district, COUNT(*) as counts FROM busi_order a,account b WHERE a.oper_id=b.operatorid AND a.pay_flag=1 GROUP BY b.district;
